Function Documentation

int EulerRPYToQuat ( const double *  rpyVector,
double *  quaternion 
)

RPY to Quaternion

Converts the rotation described by the three Euler angles (yaw, pitch, row) into the four-element quaternion vector (qs,qx,qy,qz).

Parameters:
rpyVector Input. RPY vector - [roll, pitch, yaw].
quaternion Output. Quaternion vector - [qs, qx, qy, qz].

int HMatrixToQuat ( const double *  hMatrix,
double *  quaternion 
)

Quaternion to Homogeneous Transformation

Converts a quaternion to a homogeneous matrix.

Parameters:
hMatrix Input. Homogeneous matrix described by a 16-vector.
quaternion Output. Quaternion vector - [qs, qx, qy, qz].

int QuatConjugate ( double *  quaternion  ) 

Conjugate Quaternion.

Computes the conjugate of a Quaternion.

Parameters:
quaternion Input/Output. Input is overwritten by the conjugate Quaternion - [qs, qx, qy, qz].

int QuatInverse ( double *  quaternion  ) 

Quaternion Inversion

Computes the inversion of a Quaternion.

Parameters:
quaternion Input/Output. Input is overwritten by the inversed Quaternion - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
Returns:
It returns zero if succesful. Otherwise, it returns one if a divied-by-zero error occurs.

double QuatMagnitude ( const double *  quaternion  ) 

Quaterion Magnitude.

Computes the magnitude of a quaternion.

Parameters:
quaternion Intput. Quaternion vector - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
Returns:
It returns quaterion magnitude.

int QuatNormalize ( double *  quaternion  ) 

Unitize a Quaternion.

Computes normalized quaternion.

Parameters:
quaternion Input/Output. Input is overwritten by the unitized Quaternion - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
Returns:
It returns zero if succesful. Otherwise, it returns one if a divied-by-zero error occurs.

int QuatQuatDiv ( double *  quaternion1,
double *  quaternion2,
double *  resultQuaternion 
)

Quaternion Division

Computes Quaternion-Quaternion division.

Parameters:
quaternion1 Input. Quaternion vector1 - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
quaternion2 Input. Quaternion vector2 - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
resultQuaternion Output. Quaternion division result - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
Returns:
It returns zero if succesful. Otherwise, it returns one if a divied-by-zero error occurs.

double *  quaternion2,
double *  resultQuaternion

Quaternion Multiplication

Computes Quaternion-Quaternion product.

Parameters:
quaternion1 Input. Quaternion vector1 - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
quaternion2 Input. Quaternion vector2 - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
resultQuaternion Output. Quaternion Product result - [qs, qx, qy, qz].

int QuatToEulerRPY ( const double *  quaternion,
double *  rpyVector 
)

Quaternion to RPY

Converts the four-element unit quaternion (qs,qx,qy,qz) into the equivalent thre e Euler angle rotations (yaw, pitch, row).

Parameters:
quaternion Intput. Quaternion vector - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
rpyVector Output. RPY vector - [roll, pitch, yaw].

Quaternion to Rotation Vector

Computes a rotation vector from a quaternion.

Parameters:
quaternion Input. Quaternion vector - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
theta Output. Rotation angle in radians.
vector Output. Cartesian vector - [x, y, z].
Returns:

int QuatVectorMult ( double *  quaternion,
double *  vector,
double *  resultVector 
)

Quaternion and Vector Product

Parameters:
quaternion Intput. Quaternion vector - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
vector Input. Cartesian vector - [x, y, z].
resultVector Output. Cartesian vector - [x, y, z].
Returns:
It returns zero if succesful. Otherwise, it returns one if divied-by-zero error occurs.

int RotAxisToQuat ( const Axis_t  axis,
const double  theta,
double *  quaternion 
)

Rotation about an Axis to Quaternion.

Computes a quaternion from a rotation about an cartesian axis.

Parameters:
axis Input. Enumeration type, AXIS_X, AXIS_Y, or AXIS_Z.
theta Input. Rotation angle in radians.
quaternion Output. Quaternion vector - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
Returns:
It returns zero if succesful. Otherwise, it returns one if a undefined AXIS type error occurs.

int RotVectorToQuat ( const double  theta,
const double *  vector,
double *  quaternion 
)

Rotation Vector to Quaternion.

Computes a quaternion from a rotation about a vector.

Parameters:
theta Input. Rotation angle in radians.
vector Input. Cartesian vector - [x, y, z].
quaternion Output. Quaternion vector - [qs, qx, qy, qz].
